ul.li1: Because Ar is devastated in a night, Moab is destroyed;
ul.li2: because Kir of Moab is devastated in a night, it is destroyed.

ul.li2: and Dibon to the high places

3They gird themselves with sackcloth in its streets;
ul.li2: on its roofs and public squares everyone wails,
ul.li1: 4And Heshbon and Elealeh cryThe Hebrew is singular out,
ul.li2: their voice is heard as far as Jahaz;
ul.li1: therefore the armed ones of Moab cry out;
